name: @pep/session-scraper-mcp
description: MCP server for scraping sites using your existing browser session (Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.)

scripts.build: npm run build:cli && npm run build:mcp
scripts.build:cli: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --minify --external electron --external chromium-bidi && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/index.js > dist/index.tmp && mv dist/index.tmp dist/cli.js && rm -f dist/index.js && chmod +x dist/cli.js
scripts.build:mcp: bun build src/mcp-server.ts --outdir dist --target node --minify --external electron --external chromium-bidi && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/mcp-server.js > dist/mcp-server.tmp && mv dist/mcp-server.tmp dist/mcp-server.js && chmod +x dist/mcp-server.js

author: PepijnSenders
